resources.string: After clicking play on the main menu screen, you will be taken to a game area. In this game area you can prepare and get ready. When the screen is touched, the ball begins moving. The goal is to keep the ball from hitting the bottom of the screen. You can grab the paddle and move it around to deflect the ball away from the bottom of the screen, but your ball will change direction depending on where it was hit on the paddle, so keep that in mind. Every hit on your paddle is another point, if you hit the bottom of the screen, you start over.
The options page gives you different ways to change the game experience. Currently the only changes that can be made are color changes to the paddle and the ball.
